Wisdom: إِذَا وَصَلَتْ إِلَيْكُمْ أَطْرَافُ النِّعَمِ فَلَا تُنَفِّرُوا أَقْصَاهَا بِقِلَّةِ الشُّكْرِ
enWisdom: When the edges of blessings reach you, then do not repel their peaks by lack of gratitude

Wisdom: قِلَّةُ الشُّكْرِ تُزَهِّدُ فِي اصْطِنَاعِ الْمَعْرُوفِ
enWisdom: Lack of gratitude removes the desire to do good deeds

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَشْكُرِ الْإِنْعَامَ فَلْيُعَدَّ مِنَ الْأَنْعَامِ
enWisdom: One who does not show gratitude for favours should be counted [as being] from the livestock [rather than being human]

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُحِطِ النِّعَمَ بِالشُّكْرِ لَهَا فَقَدْ عَرَّضَهَا لِزَوَالِهَا
enWisdom: One who does not begird [his] blessings by being grateful for them has indeed exposed them to cessation

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَشْكُرِ الْإِحْسَانَ لَمْ يَعْدُهُ الْحِرْمَانُ
enWisdom: One who is not grateful for favours is not spared from deprivation
One whose gratitude diminishes, his goodness [and blessing] comes to an end

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَشْكُرِ النِّعْمَةَ مُنِعَ الزِّيَادَةَ
enWisdom: One who does not show gratitude for blessing is deprived of more [blessings]

Wisdom: مُصِيبَةٌ يُرْجَى خَيْرُهَا [أَجْرُهَا] خَيْرٌ مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ لَا يُؤَدَّى شُكْرُهَا
enWisdom: A hardship from which good is expected is better than a blessing for which gratitude is not expressed

Wisdom: نِعْمَةٌ لَا تُشْكَرُ كَسَيِّئَةٍ لَا تُغْفَرُ
enWisdom: The blessing that is not appreciated is like the evil that is not forgiven
Many a person toils for the one who is not grateful to him
